roleset.name: eat casually
roleset.note: MUNCH-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls chew-39.2-1. Comparison with 'eat'. (from munch.01-v)

example.name: business casual?
example.text: *trace*-1 Munching pizza when they could and yelling until their voices gave out, [the two Benjamin Jacobson specialists at the Big Board's UAL trading post]-1 yesterday presided over what can only be described as a financial free-for-all.
